gov.usgs.edge.config

Class EdgemomConfigFiles

  • java.lang.Object
    • gov.usgs.edge.config.EdgemomConfigFiles

  • public final class EdgemomConfigFiles
extends java.lang.Object
    This class makes the roles_NODE, groups_NODE and edgemom.setup* for all of the current setting of roles to CPUs. The makeAllFiles() method is normally used by the configuration code (Mainly EdgemomConfigThread) to create all of the files in EDGEMOM subdirectory. The various build routines make StringBuilders in case the results of a single config is needed by a GUI or some such.

      • setParent

      • GenEdgeStringBuilder

        public static java.lang.StringBuilder GenEdgeStringBuilder(java.util.ArrayList<Edgemomsetup> threads,
                                                           java.util.ArrayList<Role> roles,
                                                           java.lang.String account)
        this will add the threads for the given roll and account and return an StringBuilder with the results. Duplicates tags and one only threads will have been eliminated if there are are any in the given threads plus the added threads from roll and account.
        Parameters:
        threads - List of threads, if not empty the roll/account will be added to this list
        roles - The roll list of roles
        account - The account to add
        Returns:
        The string builder with the edgemom.setup file, and the amended set of threads

                                 java.lang.String account)
        this adds Edgemomsetup for the given roleID and account to the ArrayList of Edgemomsetups
        Parameters:
        threads - An arrayList of threads in EdgemomSetup form where the list of threads is returned to caller
        role - Role of the desired edgemom
        account - of the desired edgemom (vdl, vdl1, etc)

        generate the groups_NODE file
        Parameters:

      • makeAllFiles

        public static void makeAllFiles(java.lang.String configDir)
        This method creates all group_NODE, roles_NODE and edgemom.setup files from the database for all roles and for the current roles-to-cpu mappings and puts them in the EDGEMOM directory. It also writes all edgefile side files into the EDGEMOM directory. This is called by the EdgemomConfigThread.run() to create all the files when a reconfiguration event is detected.
        Parameters:
        configDir - Path to the configuration directory

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
        Parameters:
        args - the command line arguments
